sentences.en: A number of intoxicants are associated with metabolic acidosis.
sentences.cn: 许多毒性物质可引起代谢性酸中毒.

sentences.en: Abnormally low or high body temperatute effect a variety of physiologic responses including lowered metabolic rate.
sentences.cn: 不正常的低或高体温会影响动物体各种不同的生理应答,包括低代谢率.

sentences.en: Accompanying the biochemical, metabolic, and visceral changes are a series of endocrine alterations.
sentences.cn: 在生化 、 代谢以及内脏发生变化的同时,还有一系列的内分泌变化.

sentences.en: Autochthonous or allochthonous, may be important in the total metabolic system of lakes and streams.
sentences.cn: 自源的或他源的在湖泊与河流的总代谢系统中都可能是重要的.

sentences.en: Both require quite an expensive metabolic commitment on the part of the insect.
sentences.cn: 对于昆虫,在这两方面都需要有很昂贵的代谢的义务.

sentences.en: Chemical carcinogens generally require metabolic conversion to some form of " ultimate " carcinogen.
sentences.cn: 化学致癌物一般需要通过代谢来转换成某种形式的 “ 最终 ” 致癌物.

sentences.en: Exercise can increase your metabolic rate.
sentences.cn: 运动可以提高新陈代谢率。

sentences.en: Impressive metabolic alternations have been undergone during embryogenesis.
sentences.cn: 在胚胎发生期间经历了深刻的代谢变化.

sentences.en: Increased renal excretion occurs with both respiratory and metabolic alkalosis.
sentences.cn: 在呼吸性碱中毒和代谢性碱中毒中钾离子的肾排泄增加.

sentences.en: Metabolic activity quickly develops in the cells of the embryo and the aleurone layer.
sentences.cn: 胚细胞和糊粉层中的代谢活性立即活跃起来.

sentences.en: Regular exercise can increase your basal metabolic rate.
sentences.cn: 定期运动能够提高你的基础代谢率。

sentences.en: She will never gain weight, she will become a metabolic underachiever.
sentences.cn: 她永远不会发胖, 只是新陈代谢不足.

sentences.en: Such sites act as metabolic sinks.
sentences.cn: 这些部位起着代谢废物库的作用.

sentences.en: the metabolic activity of the brain
The nitrogen components of amino acids are not channeled into well - defined metabolic sequences.
sentences.cn: 氨基酸的氮成分未被导入确定的代谢顺序中去.

sentences.en: Whether autochthonous or allochthonous, may be important in the total metabolic system of lakes and streams.
sentences.cn: 无论是自源的或他源的, 在湖泊与河流的总代谢系统中都可能是重要的.

sentences.en: Your metabolic rate is the speed at which your body transforms food into energy.
sentences.cn: 新陈代谢率是身体把食物转换为能量的速度。

words.tran_cn: 变化的；[生理]新陈代谢的

phrases.tran_cn: 代谢活动；新陈代谢活动
